Description: Automatically rejoins the Ranked queue after you are done with a Ranked Game. Also works with BetterTOS2 Classic for automatically rejoining.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Use for all Game Modes
CheckboxSettings.Description: This was suggested by a crazy person but toggles the mod to work on ALL gamemodes, not just Ranked.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Lobby Leave Delay
IntegerInputSettings.Description: Input the number of seconds to wait before leaving the lobby.
